original_text: And the prince shall enter by the way of the porch of that gate without, and shall stand by the post of the gate, and the priests shall prepare his burnt offering and his peace offerings, and he shall worship at the threshold of the gate: then he shall go forth; but the gate shall not be shut until the evening.
korean_text: 군주는 바깥 문 현관을 통하여 들어와서 문 벽 곁에 서고 제사장은 그를 위하여 번제와 감사제를 드릴 것이요 군주는 문 통로에서 예배한 후에 밖으로 나가고 그 문은 저녁까지 닫지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: by the way of the porch of that gate without
and shall stand by the post of the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 문 기둥 곁에 설 것이라

sentences.original_text: and the priests shall prepare his burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장들은 그의 번제물을 준비할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he shall worship at the threshold of the gate
but the gate shall not be shut until the evening
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 문은 저녁까지 닫히지 않을 것이다
